summary: Ever walked through skyrim, wishing you could go around beating up the imperials, Stormcloaks, Civilians, Humans or any other rascist whim of yours. well soon you can. . . . .
descriptionHtml:
-ARMIES OF SKYRIM-
WIP

Things to come

Ever walked through skyrim wishing you could get an army to go around beating up the imperials, Stormcloaks, Civilians, Humans or any other rascist whim of yours. well soon you can. . . . 

This mod will add large scale follower armies, but for now there is only Stormcloaks, They are now outside the sleeping giants inn, there are 20 full combat Stormcloaks and a comander, by talking to the comander you can have the stormcloak army follow you, they though of course keep there factions, hence making them more realistic, by attacking imperials on sight. 

Contents
Stormcloak army (20 + 1 commander)
Follow, wait and return options

Armies to come:
Imperials
Bandits
Falmer
Forsworn
Vampires
Werewolves
Necromancers
Suggestions?


your allowed to bring followers too, but if there factioned against the army, they WILL kill them

Simple enough mod, thought it might spice up the game
author: Chuckmccaw
